Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the cast of the movie 'Hungama 2' released in 2021?
Options:
A. Shilpa Shetty plays the role of Anjali 'Anju' Tiwari.
B. Paresh Rawal portrays the character Radhe Shyam Tiwari.
C. Shilpa Shetty and Paresh Rawal are siblings in the movie.
D. Anjali 'Anju' Tiwari is married to Radhe Shyam Tiwari.
Answer: Shilpa Shetty plays the role of Anjali 'Anju' Tiwari., Paresh Rawal portrays the character Radhe Shyam Tiwari., Anjali 'Anju' Tiwari is married to Radhe Shyam Tiwari.
